scan_table_check.description: Column names are not just column names - they are also used in scripts as object member variables. Some key words are restricted in JavaScript others may clash with existing members of GlideRecord or other classes used to represent records. As a result, some column names should just be avoided. Examples are "constructor", "class" and "query".
scan_table_check.name: CodeSanity - Forbidden column names
scan_table_check.resolution_details: Replace such columns with new columns. Change existing configuration and code to use the new columns. Consider a migration strategy to transform existing production data from the old columns into new columns.
scan_table_check.short_description: Some column names must be avoided
